creditline: Gift from the Helen D. Ling Collection in celebration of the 100th anniversary of the Minneapolis Institute of Art
department: Chinese, South and Southeast Asian Art
description: two children at left seen through window, seated at a table, reading; three children at right at a table, seen through an open doorway; child in blue at right painting with a brush on paper; blue, green and tan rock in LRC; foliage with red blossoms visible at top above roofs
title: Children reading and painting
